mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_schools_function( id, schooluuid, hik_cloud, hkschooluuid, yun_hen, yhschoolid, yun_hen_phone, yi_xue_yun, yxyschoolid, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by, del_flag, remarks, abc_school, epad_type, seewo_schooluid ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{schooluuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hikCloud, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hkschooluuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yunHen, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yhschoolid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yunHenPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yiXueYun, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yxyschoolid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abcSchool, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{epadType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seewoSchooluid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_schools_function WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

DELETE FROM t_schools_function WHERE id in
#{item, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.schooluuid schooluuid, a.hik_cloud hikCloud, a.hkschooluuid hkschooluuid, a.yun_hen yunHen, a.yhschoolid yhschoolid, a.yun_hen_phone yunHenPhone, a.yi_xue_yun yiXueYun, a.yxyschoolid yxyschoolid, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createDate, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateDate, a.create_by createBy, a.update_by updateBy, a.del_flag delFlag, a.remarks remarks, a.abc_school abcSchool, a.epad_type epadType, a.seewo_schooluid seewoSchooluid FROM t_schools_function a WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.id id, a.schooluuid schooluuid, a.hik_cloud hikCloud, a.hkschooluuid hkschooluuid, a.yun_hen yunHen, a.yhschoolid yhschoolid, a.yun_hen_phone yunHenPhone, a.yi_xue_yun yiXueYun, a.yxyschoolid yxyschoolid, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createDate, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateDate, a.create_by createBy, a.update_by updateBy, a.del_flag delFlag, a.remarks remarks, a.abc_school abcSchool, a.epad_type epadType, a.seewo_schooluid seewoSchooluid FROM t_schools_function a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM t_schools_function a WHERE 1=1
